notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. It might have been moved, deleted, or you entered the wrong URL.
notFound.contactSupport: If you believe this is an error, please contact our support team.

general.title: Something went wrong!

general.contactSupport: If this error continues to occur, please contact our support team with the error details above.

hero.description: Innovative solutions for modern energy. We connect tradition with the future, creating sustainable energy systems for future generations.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: We are pioneers in the field of renewable energy sources. Our mission is to create a sustainable energy future through innovative technologies and intelligent solutions.
mission.description2: We combine years of experience with the most modern technologies to provide our clients with the best possible solutions for their energy needs.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description1: We believe in the power of renewable energy sources. Our solutions are designed to minimize environmental impact and maximize energy efficiency.
sustainability.description2: We implement every project with regard to long-term sustainability and positive impact on the community and environment.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description1: We constantly invest in research and development of new technologies. Our teams work on solutions that push the boundaries of what is possible in energy.
innovation.description2: We use the most modern technologies including artificial intelligence and machine learning to optimize energy systems.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description1: We believe in the power of cooperation. Our clients are partners for us, with whom we build long-term relationships based on trust and mutual benefit.
partnership.description2: We provide comprehensive support from initial planning to long-term operation and maintenance of energy systems.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We provide comprehensive energy solutions for various types of projects

installation.title: System Installation
installation.description: Complete installation of energy systems with guarantee of quality and reliability.

monitoring.title: Monitoring
monitoring.description: Continuous performance monitoring and optimization of energy systems.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: Preventive and repair maintenance for maximum system lifespan.

contact.title: Are you interested?
contact.subtitle: Contact us and together we will find the best solution for your energy needs

hero.description: Advanced technology solutions for industrial automation and smart manufacturing processes.

mission.title: Industrial Innovation
mission.description1: We develop cutting-edge automation solutions that transform traditional manufacturing into smart, efficient operations.
mission.description2: Our expertise spans from robotics to AI-driven process optimization, delivering measurable improvements in productivity.

sustainability.title: Smart Manufacturing
sustainability.description1: Our solutions reduce waste, optimize energy consumption, and improve overall operational efficiency.
sustainability.description2: We help manufacturers achieve their sustainability goals while maintaining competitive advantage.

hero.description: Renewable energy solutions and grid modernization for a sustainable energy future.

mission.title: Energy Transformation
mission.description1: We lead the transition to clean energy through innovative renewable solutions and smart grid technologies.
mission.description2: Our comprehensive approach covers everything from solar and wind installations to energy storage and grid integration.

sustainability.title: Clean Energy Future
sustainability.description1: Every project contributes to reducing carbon emissions and building resilient energy infrastructure.
sustainability.description2: We focus on community-centered solutions that provide long-term environmental and economic benefits.

hero.title: Technological containers turnkey
hero.description: Technological containers that we manufacture to measure for the diverse needs of our customers.

company.title: Introduction of MULTICONT CONTAINERS s.r.o.
company.description: The company was established in connection with the increased demand for quality processed technological containers on the Czech market. This motivated us to start manufacturing custom containers with the highest quality and excellent delivery time. We are part of the AKURAT GROUP. And we can meet even the most demanding requirements. Contact us and see our quality and reliability.

specifications.title: Technological possibilities of our containers
specifications.capabilities1: We have a welding shop, paint shop and we are able to ensure final assembly of technologies.
specifications.capabilities2: We have our own design and technology department.

twinPack.title: Twin pack 14 meters long
twinPack.description: For a customer in the UK, we manufactured a custom twin pack - two containers connected into one. This is a container with a unique length of more than 14 meters, in which cogeneration units for natural gas are installed: KE-MNG 140 eco and KE-MNG 450 from GENTEC.

biogas.title: Container for biogas plant
biogas.description: As part of one of our orders, we manufactured a container for placing a biogas cogeneration unit for a biogas plant in the Czech Republic. Compact dimensions ensure trouble-free placement in the BPS area.

hero.title: We aggregate flexibility
hero.description: We connect energy with digitalization. Knowledge of market functioning with knowledge of source operation. We connect decentralized sources into virtual power plants.

flexibility.title: Flexibility aggregation
flexibility.description: A modern solution that connects decentralized sources and energy consumers into one system. This reduces dependence on traditional energy sources and increases the stability of the energy grid. It also allows our partners to maximize revenue from energy production and participate in building modern energy.

operation.title: Operation of aggregated blocks and virtual power plants
operation.description: To control aggregated blocks, we use the Virtuel system, which uses elements of artificial intelligence and machine learning. Thanks to the combination of our experience with a smart control system, we are able to perfectly optimize the operation of aggregation blocks and maximize their yield. We specialize in aggregated blocks that mainly combine sources with cogeneration units. Within the group, we deal with their production and service and have long-term experience with their operation in energy systems.

management.title: Management of our own sources and sources of our partners
management.description: To control aggregated blocks, we use the Virtuel system, which uses elements of artificial intelligence and machine learning. Thanks to the combination of our experience with a smart control system, we are able to perfectly optimize the operation of aggregation blocks and maximize their yield. We specialize in aggregated blocks that mainly combine sources with cogeneration units. Within the group, we deal with their production and service and have long-term experience with their operation in energy systems.

investment.title: Investment in the construction of flexible energy sources
investment.description: We add both sources of our partners and customers, as well as our own production facilities to aggregation blocks. We have built the system from the beginning to be as sophisticated as possible and allow us to optimally manage the portfolio of our sources. This is also a guarantee of quality for our partners and customers. We manage your sources as carefully as ours.

stats.title: 22 MW we aggregate 17 sources we operate we operate
stats.description: Our group aggregates the flexibility of our partners and customers. We connect their sources into virtual power plants and optimize their operation.

services.title: Our services and solutions
services.description1: We provide comprehensive services in the field of flexibility aggregation and energy source management. Our solutions combine modern technologies with many years of experience in energy.
services.description2: We specialize in optimizing the operation of decentralized energy sources and their integration into energy markets.

flexibility.title: Flexibility aggregation
flexibility.content: We connect decentralized energy sources into virtual power plants and optimize their operation on energy markets.

management.title: Source management
management.content: We use advanced algorithms and artificial intelligence for optimal management of your energy sources.

monitoring.title: Monitoring and analysis
monitoring.content: We provide continuous monitoring of source performance and detailed analyses to maximize yields.

investment.title: Investment and development
investment.content: We invest in the construction of new flexible energy sources and support the development of sustainable energy.

company.title: Introduction of aggregaat s.r.o.
company.description: We are part of the AKURAT GROUP. We are here to manage the irregular production of small decentralized sources and to ensure that energy is produced from them when it is most needed. We thus contribute to the stabilization of energy and the development of RES. We deal fairly with our clients and at the same time let them earn fairly from aggregation and modern energy.

placeholders.title: Infrastructure Restoration in Kyiv
placeholders.description: Documentation of key infrastructure restoration in Ukraine's capital.

placeholders.title: Bridge Reconstruction in Kharkiv
placeholders.description: Process of reconstructing strategically important bridge connections.

placeholders.title: Energy Grid Restoration
placeholders.description: Modernization and restoration of energy infrastructure after war damage.

placeholders.title: Hospital Reconstruction
placeholders.description: Restoration of healthcare facilities to ensure care for civilian population.

placeholders.title: Educational Facility Restoration
placeholders.description: Reconstruction of schools and educational institutions for future generations.

placeholders.title: Transportation Infrastructure
placeholders.description: Restoration of road and rail networks to restore population mobility.
